attributes.action: Increase statutory maternity pay to the same amount as furlough pay during covid
attributes.additional_details:
Statutory maternity pay equates to approximately £600 per month. Those who have been furloughed are entitled to claim up to £2,500 per month (some earning more if employers are topping up). This is unfair.

Little support is available from friends, family, healthcare workers and the community as a result of lockdown rules. This financial burden places additional pressure on families and for some a poor mental health.

Fair pay will reduce stress and allow quality family time in the future.
attributes.background: Pay those who are claiming maternity pay the same amount as those who have been furloughed.

rejection.details:
